frames.build: Medium: Before rolling Drops, regain 1 Vigor and 1 Tension
frames.signature_feature: Your Armaments have +1 Harm if they have the Burst, Spin Up, or Splash Tags, provided they don't have the Energy Tag.
frames.system_signature_effect: You have +1 Armor for the rest of the round.

frames.build: Light: Before rolling Drops, regain 2 Tension.
frames.signature_feature: The first time you roll a 4 in a turn, ignore any Harm from the Consequence that arises.
frames.system_signature_effect: You and all allies Close to you take -1 Harm from Near and Far attackers (minimum 0) until the end of the round.

frames.build: Heavy: Before rolling Drops, regain 2 Vigor.
frames.signature_feature: Treat any Frame within Close range of you as having at least 1 Armor.
frames.system_signature_effect: You gain 3 Shields until the end of the round.

frames.build: Medium: Before rolling Drops, regain 1 Vigor and 1 Tension
frames.signature_feature: When you have no enemies in Close or Near range, you can use Systems or make Far Attacks at Extreme range. Attacks have -1 die and Systems have -1 Harm when used at this range
frames.system_signature_effect: Mark an enemy at Near or Far; they take 1 Harm immediately. Attacks against them gain +1 die, and Systems used against them have +1 Harm for the rest of the round.

frames.build: Light: Before rolling Drops, regain 2 Tension.
frames.signature_feature: After taking out an enemy at Close range, you may immediately move to a Near location.
frames.system_signature_effect: Deal Harm to every Close enemy equal to range bands moved this turn. Afterwards, take the same Harm reduced by 3.

frames.build: Heavy: Before rolling Drops, regain 2 Vigor.
frames.signature_feature: The first time you Attack during a round, you may do so against two separate targets. Each attack must use a different Armament.

frames.build: Medium: Before rolling Drops, regain 1 Vigor and 1 Tension
frames.signature_feature: At the end of your turn, you and all allies within Close range restore 1 Vigor.
frames.system_signature_effect: Deal 1 Harm to two Near enemies. Until next round, their Armor and Shields count as 0. If they're Standard enemies, they can't be activated during the GM turn.

frames.build: Light: Before rolling Drops, regain 2 Tension.
frames.signature_feature: You have +1 Armor against enemy attacks from Near and Far range.
frames.system_signature_effect: Move Close to an enemy at Close or Near. They take 2 Harm and you may move them to a Near location

frames.build: Heavy: Before rolling Drops, regain 2 Vigor.
frames.signature_feature: Standard enemies Harmed by any Armament or System can't move (including movement from Approach/Retreat Tags) for the rest of the round.
frames.system_signature_effect: Pick one Near location. Deal 1 Harm to every target Close to that Location. If their Vigor is reduced by at least 1, they move Close to you afterwards.

systems.slot_effect: Move immediately to a Far location.
Mark a Near or Far location. At the start of the next round, deal 2 Harm to every enemy Close to that location.
Choose: deal 1 Harm to four Close or Near enemies who are Close or Near to each other, or deal 2 Harm to two Close or Near enemies who are Close or Near to each other.
Choose a Near location, and deal 1 Harm to every enemy Close to that location.
Deal 3 Harm to a Close enemy
Move to a Near location, then deal 2 Harm to an enemy Close to you.
Deal 2 Harm to an enemy Close to you, then move to a Near location.
Deal 3 Harm to one Near enemy.
Deal 2 Harm to each Close enemy.
Choose: deal 2 Harm to a Near enemy, or deal 1 Harm to a Far enemy.
Deal 4 Harm to a Far enemy.
Deal 3 Harm to a Close enemy, and an additional +2 Harm if you're at half of your maximum Vigor or less.
Deal 5 Harm to a Close enemy.
Deal 3 Harm to a Far enemy.
Your Attacks this turn gain +1 die.

rangeTags.Close: Armament is usable at this noted range. When more than one range Tag is specified, you may use the Armament at any of the specified ranges.
rangeTags.Near: Armament is usable at this noted range. When more than one range Tag is specified, you may use the Armament at any of the specified ranges.
rangeTags.Far: Armament is usable at this noted range. When more than one range Tag is specified, you may use the Armament at any of the specified ranges.

systemTags.Efficient: The first time in a round that you use this System, roll a die. On a 4-6, no Fuel is expended this time.
systemTags.Holdout: If you have 0 Fuel, you may use this System by spending 1 Tension. It gains the Limited Tag when used in this way.
systemTags.Limited: You may only use this System once per round.
systemTags.Distracting: Enemies Harmed by this deal -1 Harm on their next attack this round. This effect does not stack if the enemy is Harmed more than once.
systemTags.Flashy: An enemy Harmed by this System must attack you or anyone else who Harms them with a Flashy System this round, provided that such an attack is possible. This effect lasts until the end of the round.
systemTags.Suppressive: Standard enemies Harmed by this System can't move (including movement from Approach/Retreat Tags) for the rest of the round.
systemTags.Superhot: One target affected by this System takes +1 Harm from it.
systemTags.Encouraging: Anyone affected by this System does +1 Harm with their next Attack this round.
systemTags.Enveloping: One target affected by this System gains 1 Shield or increases Shield gain by 1.
systemTags.Motivating: Anyone affected by this System may move immediately to a Near location.
systemTags.Obfuscating: Anyone affected by this System cannot be attacked until the start of the next round if the would-be attacker has at least one other target in range.
systemTags.Projecting: If this System only affects you, you can instead have it affect a Close ally. If this System only affects a Close ally, you can instead have it affect a Near ally. You must pay 1 Tension in addition to the Fuel cost.
systemTags.Protective: Anyone affected by this system reduces Harm by 1 the next time they take Harm this round.

armamentTags.Burst: +1 Harm when your roll is a 6.
armamentTags.Charge: +1 die on your first Attack with this Armament each round.
armamentTags.Critical: +1 Harm when used at half Vigor or less.
armamentTags.Distracting: Enemies Harmed by this deal -1 Harm on their next attack this round. This effect does not stack if the enemy is Harmed more than once.
armamentTags.Focused: +1 Harm when used at maximum or greater Tension.
armamentTags.Hot: Once per round, gain 1 Tension when you take out an enemy.
armamentTags.Impulsive: +1 Harm when used at half Tension or less.
armamentTags.Incendiary: Creates a Hazard at the target's location until the start of the next round. Only one Hazard can be created per location.
armamentTags.Invigorating: Once per round, regain 1 Vigor when you take out an enemy.
armamentTags.Mobile: +1 Harm if you've moved at least two range bands this round.
armamentTags.Polished: +1 Harm when used at maximum Vigor.
armamentTags.Scoped: Armament's maximum range increases to Near if Close, and to Far if Near. It has -1 die to attack at its newly extended range. If it already has Far when it gains Scoped, +1 die when used at Far if no enemies are Close/Near.
armamentTags.Sighted: Armament's minimum range increases to Near if Far, and to Close if Near. If it already has Close when it gains Sighted, +1 die and +1 Harm when used at Close if no enemies are Near/Far.
armamentTags.SpinUp: +1 Harm if your previous Attack was with this Armament.
armamentTags.Splash: Enemies who are Close to the target take 1 Harm when your roll is a 6. If the Armament has Energy and/or Piercing Tags, Splash Harm ignores Armor and/or Shields.
armamentTags.Stationary: +1 die if you haven't moved during this round.
